# resolvedSettings

**Instance Property**

The settings object that was used to request this photo capture.

## Declaration

```swift
var resolvedSettings: AVCaptureResolvedPhotoSettings { get }
```

## Discussion

To determine which [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCapturePhotoOutput/capturePhoto(with:delegate:)] call produced this photo capture result, match this [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCaptureResolvedPhotoSettings] object’s [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCaptureResolvedPhotoSettings/uniqueID] value to the [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCapturePhotoSettings/uniqueID] property of the photo settings object you requested capture with. You can also use this object to find out which values the photo output has chosen for automatic settings.

## Resolving photo capture requests

- **photoCount**: The 1-based index of this photo capture relative to other results from the same capture request.
- **timestamp**: The time at which the image was captured.
